data.title: Meggitt Sensing Systems Announces Measurement Sales Team Additions and Promotions
data.meta_description: Meggitt Sensing Systems, a Meggitt group division, has announced the recent additions of several highly experienced North American regional sales and business development managers to support technical sales efforts of its test and measurement sensing technologies. In addition, the organization has announced two key global sales team member promotions to help further its strategic growth objectives.
data.text:
October 22, 2011 San Juan Capistrano, California, USA â€“ Meggitt Sensing Systems, a Meggitt group division, has announced the recent additions of several highly experienced North American regional sales and business development managers to support technical sales efforts of its test and measurement sensing technologies. In addition, the organization has announced two key global sales team member promotions to help further its strategic growth objectives.

Among the new hires, Mark Akimoto has been named as regional sales manager for the Western United States, supporting test and measurement customers in California, Nebraska, Nevada, Oregon and Washington. Having previously served as a regional sales manager for the former Endevco Corporation, Mr. Akimoto brings to his new role more than 30 years of field experience in the successful application and troubleshooting of sensing technologies across a variety of environments.

Keith Crawford has been named as regional sales manager for the Central United States, supporting test and measurement customers in Illinois, Missouri and Wisconsin, as well as the management and support of existing sales channel relationships in Iowa, Kansas, Minnesota, Nebraska, North Dakota, Oklahoma, South Dakota and Texas. Mr. Crawford has more than 25 years of experience in the technical sales and applications engineering support of sensing and data acquisition technologies. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering from the Milwaukee School of Engineering; a Master of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Illinois at Chicago; and a Master of Business Administration degree from the University of Phoenix.

Randy Fetcenko has been named as regional sales manager for the Southwestern United States, supporting test and measurement customers, as well as territory sales representatives, in Arizona, Colorado, Idaho, Montana, New Mexico, Utah and Wyoming. Mr. Fetcenko is a 35-year industry veteran of the sensor and instrumentation space within the application areas of aerospace and defense, automotive, energy, industrial, medical and test and measurement.

Alan Stillwell has been named as business development manager, identifying major program opportunities, managing key customer relationships and offering technical advisements on customer applications, sales channels, product line enhancements and growth strategies for aerospace, energy and test and measurement related business segments. Mr. Stillwell brings to his new position more than 35 years of global sensor industry experience, in addition to space dynamics, aerodynamics engineering and product management expertise. Previous industry roles also included 15 years in a technical sales capacity with the former Endevco Corporation. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in aeronautical and astronautical engineering from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champagne.

Thai Tran has been appointed as program sales manager, responsible for the management of procurement bids, customer relationships and technical contract support of aerospace, defense, industrial and medical programs. As a 20-year aerospace industry veteran, Mr. Tran brings to his new position extensive experience in both project and applications engineering of pressure, acceleration and position sensing technologies, as well as R&D and new product development. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering from California State University at Fullerton and is a trained and certified Six Sigma Green Belt.

Ken Fukuyama has been promoted to director of sales for Asia Pacific, working with OEM and direct customers, as well as existing sales representative and distribution channels, to sell and promote Meggitts test and measurement sensing technologies throughout China, India, Japan, South Korea and other areas of Asia. Mr. Fukuyama has previously served as regional sales manager for Asia Pacific and brings to his new position more than 15 years of technical sales and territory management experience. He holds a Master of Business Administration degree from Whitworth University in Washington State.

Dan Schultz has been promoted to director of sales for the Americas, overseeing the sales activities of all test and measurement related products in Canada, Mexico, South America and the United States. He brings to his position more than 15 years of technical product sales, channel management, applications engineering and troubleshooting experience within aerospace, automotive, industrial, medical, power generation, test and measurement and turbomachinery market sectors. He has previously served as regional sales manager for Meggitts test and measurement sensing technologies in the Central United States.

Notes Measurement Group Vice President of Strategic Sales and Marketing, Terry Weed, We are pleased to announce these recent additions and promotions. It is our hope that our valued Meggitt customers will immediately and directly benefit from the increased technical support and field-proven expertise of these highly qualified individuals, each of whom brings to their position a minimum of 15 years of relevant industry experience.

For more information about Meggitt Sensing Systems and its available product line offerings, visit www.meggittsensingsystems.com.
